synopsis: El viaje de Cris is a medium-length film based on the story of Tamara Miranda, a girl who became paraplegic at the age of 16 due to a traffic accident. The objective of this film is to raise awareness among young people of the serious consequences of alcohol consumption while driving.
A short film by Waffle Brothers Entertainment
An epic Turkish racing saga that takes place in Adana. You will see a Tofaş take down a Ferrari. When tüp is there, nothing is impossible. You will laugh. You will cry. Welcome to the tüp saga.

The famous people that host "Beyaz Futbol" find themselves in a terrible situation where one man controls them. In order to be free, the Beyaz Futbol team has to do the missions that the guy gives them.
5 people from Turkey, discover themselves and each other in New York and embark new adventures.
A group of con-men try to take down a huge casino.
Based on a true story, Tosun Firarda is about the biggest scam made in the history of Turkey.
casting: ['Burak Alkaş', 'Fercan Bay', 'Kadir Gültekin', 'Tayfun Sav', 'Yaşar Şengül', 'Vahdet Çakar']

synopsis: The adventures of Keloğlan told in a modern fashion.
A group of pointless Turkish characters just wander around with no point in this pointless motion picture.
A scientist must steal back the time machine he invented, but first he must outsmart the world's most relentless security guard.
